114258073139804507.NAME: No! You tell lies. I know this is not true. Why...you would kill me with but a single blow. This is why I must be a vampire. To have that strength I know you possess. Clearly, you do not think enough of me to allow me this power. You, who could kill me with a single blow, must understand my desire for your power. Show me!

20024771124631493.NAME: Enough! You, who are so powerful, must laugh at me? If I only had the strength to kill you...but you could kill me with a single blow. This is why I must be a vampire! Get out! Mock me no longer!

847686501806225829.NAME: I know you are strong! All vampires are powerful...and feared...and death incarnate! I know you are strong. I know you cannot be bested by a mere mortal! That is all I desire! I will not rest until that power is mine.
847686501806225829.BNAM:
ModDisposition -5
ModFight 2
Journal "VA_VampRich" 60
Choice "You know nothing!" 9 "Many vampires are slain by mortals." 10

8243439107833085.NAME: No! No no no no no! You don't listen! I have the strength of my resolve. I have strength of will! I will not end my quest until I have the physical powers to crush my enemies! You have that power. I know you do! You are strong. You must be! No mortal can stand against you!
8243439107833085.BNAM:
ModDisposition -7

Journal "VA_VampRich" 60
Choice "You know nothing!" 9 "Many vampires are slain by mortals." 10

2400831361214927528.NAME: You talk in circles! There is loneliness in this life as well! Why will you not listen to me? You have strength that I need! Let me join you! I want power to crush man and mer, just as you have!
2400831361214927528.BNAM:
ModDisposition -5
ModFight 2
Choice "You are too weak to be a vampire." 7 "Vampires are not as strong as you would believe." 8

12981339121322322.NAME: But...no! I am far from stupid! Why will you not listen to me? I know the power you must have! I must share in that strength! I know you are strong! I want to be one of you!

30742075127519401.NAME: Pain? But...of course, Dark One. Pain to the mortals we will prey upon! I will slay them without mercy. I will walk the night with true power. I will kill all those who will not show me respect.
30742075127519401.BNAM:
ModDisposition -5
ModFight 2
Choice "Stupid child." 5 "You do not understand the loneliness of the unlife." 6

1672014651682310489.NAME: Ridiculous? You...! No, I see. You wish to test me. I am worthy, Dark One. Please, you must believe me. I will wield my power with no remorse. I will make other mortals tremble at my sight. I want power such as you have. You could crush me with your hands with barely an effort. I need this power!

89033079519326591.NAME: Of course. Respect, like the respect you get. Like the respect all vampires must get from we ridiculous mortals. I must be like you. It is the power that I crave. Power to be able to crush any mortal man who would dare oppose me!

10190134643227725723.NAME: Foolish? Of course. I realize it must seem so to one of your stature. I know you must look at we mortals as foolish, but I know better. I know that I should be one of your dark brotherhood. Your kind is more powerful than I could ever dream of being.

27705168951333023459.NAME: Yes, that is what I wish to do. To taste the blood of the living. To walk the night at will, feeling the power coursing through my veins. I wish to join you, to become truly powerful and respected. I wish to kill mortals and bathe in their blood.
